metadata.title: Tuesday, 18th November, 2014
metadata.session: FOURTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Justice when the outstanding retirement benefits for civil servants who retired in 1997/98 will be paid, considering that the Court has now ruled in their favour.

Minister of Tourism and Art whether the Government has any plans to degazette part of Lukusuzi National Park in Mwase-Mphangwe and Chikomeni Chiefdoms in order to create more land for the growing population.
Minister of Local Government and Housing
parts: (a)    what the housing stock deficit for the following categories of houses is:
(i)     low cost; (ii)    medium cost; and (iii)   High cost; and
(b)    what mechanisms the Government has put in place to reduce the deficit.

questions.minister: Minister of Home Affairs whether the Government has any plans to construct a clinic at Mukobeko Maximum Prison and other prisons country-wide for provision of medical services to prisoners and local residents.
questions.question_text: ORDER OF THE DAY 1    Estimates of Revenue and Expenditure (Including Capital and Constitutional and Statutory Expenditure):  Committee of Supply. Heads 07/01, 07/02, 07/03, 07/04, 07/05, 07/06, 07/07, 07/08, 07/09, 07/10, 07/22, 06/01, 08/01, 08/03, 08/04, 08/06, 08/07, 08/08, 17/01, 17/02, 17/03, 17/04, 17/05, 17/06, 17/07, 17/08, 17/09, 17/10, 17/11, 17/12, 17/13, 17/15, 17/18, 17/20, 17/23, 17/24, 17/25, 17/26, 17/27, 17/28, 17/30, 17/31, 17/32, 17/33, 17/35, 17/36, 17/37, 17/39, 17/40, 17/41, 17/42, 17/43, 17/45, 17/46, 17/47, 17/48, 17/49, 17/50, 17/51, 17/52, 17/53, 17/54 and 17/55 - for consideration. KEY TO HEADS OF EXPENDITURE Head 07    -    Office of the Auditor-General Head 06    -    Public Service Commission – Office of the President Head 08    -    Cabinet Office – Office of the President Head 17    -    Ministry of Foreign Affairs
